text: ChatiZZe has a built-in end-to-end encryption which means only you and the person you're communicating with can read them, and nobody in between, not even ChatiZZe.
You can share your feelings with a provided list of emojis. Customize your chats, wrap the app with colorful themes.
Send photos and videos on ChatiZZe instantly. Photos and videos send quickly even if you're on a slow connection.
Send PDFs, documents, spreadsheets, slideshows and more, without the hassle of file sharing apps. You can send files up to 30 MB.

Keep in touch with the groups of people that matter the most. Group chats have the same features as the private ones, but moreover, you can change name of your group, mute people, customize notifications, and more.

With ChatiZZe on the web and desktop, you can seamlessly sync all of your chats to your computer so that you can chat on whatever device is most convenient for you. Download the desktop app or visit chatizze.herokuapp.com to get started.
